name: Little Tennis (itch)
description:
1 - start single player match against computer
2 - start 2-player match

Player 1:
A,S,W,D - move player / target
SPACE - serve / try to hit ball

Player 2:
Arrow Keys - move player / target
RETURN - serve / try to hit ball

ESCAPE - end match / start demo mode

(Do not press F or Backspace during match.)

(C) 2015 Harry Trautmann / Metacozm

All art and code done by Harry Trautmann except the following external assets:

Sfx "tennis.flac"
by Pullover aus Milch
http://www.freesound.org/people/Pullover%20aus%20M...
via CC-BY

Sfx "tennis ball.wav"
by rasskot
http://www.freesound.org/people/rasskot/sounds/245...
via CC-0

Sfx "Applause 5.WAV"
by Sandermotions
http://www.freesound.org/people/Sandermotions/soun...
via CC-0

Font "Segment 14"
by Paul Flo Williams
https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/segment14
via OFL (Open Font License)
